poem:
### Bloodied Icon

In the aftermath, a hero painted,
canvas of chaos, stroke of noise.
Ear blooded, a nation's wound,
converts to cloth, a crude disguise.
Fight, fight, fight! cry the sellers,
selling stitches to unsewn seams,
turning pain into merchandise,
while the scabs are yet to form.
